column5: Sept. 24 (Xinhua) – The Phnom Penh Municipal Court judge  granted temporary bail to plastic surgery clinic owner ------Hov Dane------ and a plastic surgeon at 7.35 pm on January 24
column7: according to a news source.  The owner of Dermo Clinic and the surgeon had been ------detained in PJ prison------ since the ruling of Municipal Court investigating judge Mong Sophea  on the afternoon of 5 January 2019.------The case involves complaints over patients being extorted by the clinic after  corrective surgery and body enhancements.
